com.viaoa.util
Class SizeOf

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.util.SizeOf

public class SizeOf
extends java.lang.Object

Used to get the actual object size, similar to C sizeof method. Create manifest file "sizeof.mf", with this line: (no begin/ending spaces) Premain-Class: com.viaoa.util.SizeOf create jar file with this class: To run, add command line option to runtime: java -javaagent:sizeof.jar ...

Author:
vincevia

                          boolean bIncludeReferences)
Get the runtime size of an object, with/out including the size of references.

Parameters:

bIncludeReferences - if true then all references are also included.
